p:
A high-throughput screening campaign of a library of approved drugs and clinical candidates revealed six small molecules, ebselen, disulfiram, carmofur, tideglusib, shikonin and PX-12, as inhibitors of SARS-CoV-2 M pro ( Fig. 7).
79 Mass spectrometry experiments showed that ebselen, carmofur and PX-12 covalently modify Cys145. Small covalent modifiers like these may bind unspecifically, a characteristic associated with pan-assay interference compounds (PAINS).
95 Ebselen showed antiviral activity in Vero cells in the low micromolar range. In case of carmofur, a crystal structure of SARS-CoV-2 M pro revealed transfer of the hexylurea side chain to Cys145, forming a hexylcarbamothioate interacting with the S 2 subsite (PDB: 7BUY).
96
